com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.gameobjects

Interface Renderable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEntity, AbstractGameObject, AnimatedBlock, BenchmarkBall, Bullet, Cursor, DestructionParticle, EntityBlock, EntityShadow, Explosion, Laserdot, MovableEntity, Particle, ParticleEmitter, PlayerWithWeapon, PointLightSource, RenderBlock, Sea, SimpleEntity, Weapon

    public interface Renderable
    Interface for objects whether they are blocks and entities.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpriteId

        byte getSpriteId()
        the id of the sprite using for rendering.
        By default is the same as the object id but in some cases some objects share one sprite so they can have the same.
        Returns:
        if spritevalue is not custom set uses value.

      • getSpriteValue

        byte getSpriteValue()
        Get the value. It is like a sub-id and can identify the status.
        Returns:
        in range [0;Block.VALUESNUM]. Is -1 if about to destroyed.

      • setSpriteValue

        void setSpriteValue(byte value)
        Set the value.
        Parameters:
        value - in range [0;Block.VALUESNUM]. Is -1 if about to destroyed.

      • getLightlevelR

        float getLightlevelR()
        How bright is the object? The lightlevel is a scale applied to the color. 1 is default value.
        Returns:
        1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • getLightlevelG

        float getLightlevelG()
        How bright is the object? The lightlevel is a scale applied to the color. 1 is default value.
        Returns:
        1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • getLightlevelB

        float getLightlevelB()
        How bright is the object? The lightlevel is a scale applied to the color. 1 is default value.
        Returns:
        1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • setLightlevel

        void setLightlevel(float lightlevel)
        Set the brightness of the object. The lightlevel is a scaling factor. 1 is default value.
        Parameters:
        lightlevel - 1 is default bright. 0 is black.

      • markPermanent

        void markPermanent()
        Marked as visited.

      • isMarked

        boolean isMarked()
        Returns:

      • unmarkTemporarily

        void unmarkTemporarily()

      • markTemporarily

        void markTemporarily()
        Mark temporarily for depth sort.

      • isMarkedTemporarily

        boolean isMarkedTemporarily()
        Returns:

      • render

        void render(GameView view,
            Camera camera)
        Draws an object if it is not hidden and not clipped.
        Parameters:
        view - the view using this render method
        camera - The camera rendering the scene

      • getPosition

        Position getPosition()
        Return the coordinates of the object in the game world.
        Returns:
        Reference to the position object which points to the location in the game world.

      • shouldBeRendered

        Parameters:

        Returns:
